name: tm29
effect: Teaches Psychic to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Psychic to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
